text: Ligeia Mare is a lake on Titan at 79.0° N, 248.0° W, measuring around 500 km in width. It is named after Ligeia, one of the sirens in Greek mythology. Ligeia Mare has been a proposed lake to land the Titan Lake In-situ Sampling Propelled Explorer space probe ==Other websites== *Map of the liquid bodies in the north polar region of Titan Category:Saturn's moons
title: Ligeia Mare
